name: scoala-romanu
description: Editorial by HTML5 UP html5up.net | @ajlkn Free for personal and commercial use under the CCA 3.0 license (html5up.net/license)

scripts.minify-js: minify src/assets/js/main.js > src/assets/js/main.min.js && minify src/assets/js/util.js > src/assets/js/util.min.js
scripts.start: rimraf public && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev" "npm run netlify-cms-proxy"
scripts.prebuild: rimraf public && npm run sass-compile && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
